import React from "react"; import "./About.css"; import Button2 from "../button/Button2"; import pastry from "../../images/instagram1/pastry.jpg"; import crembrule from "../../images/instagram1/crembrule.jpg"; import inside from "../../images/restaurant-inside.jpg"; import face from "../../images/female-faces/Face/face-05.svg"; const About = () => { return (
{/* RESTAURANT ABOUT START */}
{/* ROW START */}

The Borscht feel

A family business

The company was founded by Jean-Pierre Ceccaldi in 1978. He was then joined by his son Simon. Throughout its creations, the company has been able to acquire a strong reputation, while remaining both modern and authentic.

{/* ROW END */}
{/* ROW START */}
{/* ROW END */}
{/* RESTAURANT ABOUT END */} {/* RESTAURANT ENVIRONMENT START */}
{/* ROW START */}

Authenticity at it's finest

Bringing Russia to you

From the design to the final crafting of a knife, many work techniques are used â€” the processing of steel, of course, but also that of wood, horn, or precious metals. It is the combination of these particular techniques that gives Ceccaldi knife-makers this unique know-how.

{/* ROW END */}
{/* ROW START */}
{/* ROW END */}
{/* ROW START */}

A unique experience

every time

Borscht N Tears prides itself as being the oldest Russian restaurant in the United Kingdom, and one of the oldest in the world, originally opening our doors in 1965. We are a small local business, that strives to supply high quality pan Russian cuisine using only the freshest seasonal ingredients. We have only the best live musicians performing in the restaurant, to create an unforgettable experience.

{/* ROW END */}
{/* ROW START */}
{/* ROW END */}
{/* RESTAURANT ENVIRONMENT END */}
); }; export default About;
